text:
There was a change fairly recently that made it a lot easier to find the right templates for the System Pages (previously it showed the same file name for all versions of the theme).

It would be great if the same update were made for the Email > Subscriptions > templates (still shows the old way)

Sharing this idea: HubSpot needs mobile deign vs. desktop in the email drag and drop builder, help me make this happen in 2023: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Desktop-vs-Mobile-Email-Layout/idi-p/302794|https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Desktop-vs-Mobile-Email-Layout/idi-p/302794>
